bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with han ou 寒嘔 . Pu ji fang 普濟方 26: 丁附散，治冷吐，翻胃 , “Powder with ding and fu , to cure cold vomiting and upset stomach”.

② Therapeutic Approach of letting patients gargle with a liquid medication to cure ailments affecting the oral cavity. The patient is requested to hold a warm or hot liquid medication in his mouth until it has cooled down, then he is supposed to spit it out. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 治齒間血出方。以苦竹葉濃煮之，與鹽少許，寒温得所，含之， 冷吐 , “Recipe to cure intradental bleeding: Boil bitter bamboo leaves to a thick liquid, and add a little salt. When it is not too cold and not too warm hold it in the mouth until it has cooled down, then spit it out”.
